column4: Hi, I accidentally deleted /etc/init.d/screen and apt-get --reinstall screen doesn't create that file, what can I do ?
Hi, I accidentally deleted /etc/init.d/screen and apt-get --reinstall screen doesn't create that file <-- any ideeas ?
it say it wants to remove ubuntu-desktop ...
that's fine.  ubuntu-desktop is a metapackage.  When you reinstall, reinstall ubuntu-desktop as well.
